panels.description: Latest poll height our validator voted on. Should continuously increase. Use this for alerting if it stops increasing.
panels.title: Our Validator - Latest Poll Height

panels.description: Cumulative total votes cast by our validator
panels.title: Our Validator - Total Votes

panels.description: Percentage of votes that were Yes
panels.title: Our Validator - Yes Vote %

panels.description: Rate of poll height increase. Should be > 0 if voting. Alert if == 0 for > 5 minutes.
panels.title: Height Increase Rate (polls/sec)

panels.description: This should show a continuous linear uptrend. If our validator's line stops increasing, voting has stopped. Use this metric for alerting: `increase(rcosmos_axelar_evm_votes_latest_height{alerts="true"}[5m]) == 0`
panels.title: Latest Poll Height by Validator (Linear Uptrend - Alert Metric)

panels.description: This shows votes missed by moniker
panels.title: EVM votes missed

panels.description: Cumulative total votes. Note: resets on exporter restart.
panels.title: Total Votes by Validator

panels.description: Rate of voting over time. Should be relatively constant if voting consistently.
panels.title: Voting Rate (Votes per Minute)

panels.description: Total number of votes missed by our validator. Should be 0 if voting correctly. Alert if > 0.
panels.title: Our Validator - Total Missed Votes

panels.description: Missed votes broken down by sender_chain → recipient_chain pairs. Use this to identify which chain pairs are being missed.
panels.title: Missed Votes by Chain Pair

panels.description: Missed votes over time. Each line represents a different chain pair. Alert if any line increases.
panels.title: Missed Votes Over Time by Chain Pair

panels.description: Comprehensive breakdown of votes and missed votes by chain pair for our validator. Shows Yes, No, Late, and Missed votes per chain pair.
panels.title: Vote Breakdown by Chain Pair (Our Validator)
